item.description:
Holiday is coming, let's dress up and go party!
This event are FREE to all models and MUAH but photographers need to pay $45.00 fee to cover the organizing cost.

Please dress up nicely :)))

Main feature is "female figure with body makeup arts"
Models for the above is Caitlin,Colleen, Leandra and Phyllis
MUA (face & body)- Nastaran
Hair - Amanda

Other models and MUA and Hair Stylist will be listed later

This location is nice and fun, you will get interesting shots but there will be no strobe light so please bring your flash if you have one or you need fast lens and high ISO :)

Because it is a restaurant so you will not allow to bring drink and food there but if you want drink and food there will be the bar and of course you could order the food there.

Â 

If one wants to bring a small toy to donate for the Toys for Tots program, it would be honored :).
item.how_to_find_us: The photoshoot in on Sunday so street parking is FREE but I will take the T and walk there :)
item.name: 2012 BPP Holiday Party Photoshoot
